sentences.en: " But, he insists, "if we support economic reform in Cuba as a means of empowering the Cuban people, then we have to help create the conditions to realize that objective.
sentences.cn: 但是，他还坚称，“如果古巴的经济改革是经古巴人民的授权的，我们不仅支持，而且我们要帮助创造条件，实现这一目标。”

sentences.en: A little later, the Cuban passed around fine Havana cigars.
sentences.cn: 过了一会, 古巴人拿出上好的雪茄烟分给每人一支.

sentences.en: As expected, the Cuban cigar industry was not happy with the ruling.
sentences.cn: 正如预期的那样, 古巴雪茄业对这个裁决非常不满.

sentences.en: As the news spread that I was on my way out, my Cuban neighbours congratulated me on what they saw as a promotion.
sentences.cn: 我要回国的消息一传出，我的古巴邻居就争先恐后的来祝贺我，仿佛他们把这当成一种晋升。

sentences.en: But he says pressure for broad reform on the next Cuban leader, from inside Cuba and outside, will grow.
sentences.cn: 可是他说，来自古巴境内和境外要求古巴下任领导人进行广泛改革的压力将会增加。

sentences.en: He tells of a Cuban fisherman who is a simpleton.
sentences.cn: 他讲的是个愚蠢的古巴渔民.

sentences.en: I was a shade anxious about being drawn into the Cuban business.
sentences.cn: 我多少有点担心卷入古巴问题中去.

sentences.cn: 在达拉斯的一段ESPN电台采访中, 库班说: 你能想象 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mark Cuban's best player is still a tall gawky German guy.
sentences.cn: 马克库班的最好的球员依然是那个迟钝的德国大个儿.

sentences.en: Sotomayor, the Cuban holder of the world high jump record, cleared 2.36 metres.
sentences.cn: 古巴的世界跳高纪录保持者索托马约尔跳过了2.36米。

sentences.en: The Cuban missile crisis of 1962 brought home to the Soviets the penalty for strategic inferiority.
sentences.cn: 一九六二年的古巴导弹危机使苏联人清醒地看到战略劣势造成的不利后果.

sentences.en: The Cuban women's team could have become the Olympic champion earlier.
sentences.cn: 古巴女徘早该成为奥运会冠军了.

sentences.cn: 其次是水稻 、 烟草 、 柑橘等, 古巴雪茄烟享誉世界.

sentences.en: Whether Cuban , Mexican or Puerto Rican , most Latinos revere la familia.
sentences.cn: 不管是古巴人 、 墨西哥人.

trans.tran_en: Cuban means belonging or relating to Cuba, or to its people or culture
A Cuban is a Cuban citizen, or a person of Cuban origin
